solution_line_template: Jackie walks {jackie_daily} - {jessie_daily} = <<{jackie_daily}-{jessie_daily}={daily_difference}>>{daily_difference} miles more each day than Jessie.
So in {num_days} days, Jakie walks {daily_difference} x {num_days} = <<{daily_difference}*{num_days}={total_difference}>>{total_difference} miles more than Jessie.
